v4:customization.v4:name: Video Hardware Options
v4:customization.v4:shortDescription: Select the TOTAL number of TVs to be connected to U-verse. Each TV requires a receiver for U-verse Service.
v4:customization.v4:longDescription: You have a Total Home DVR included at no charge with your package. Only 1 DVR is needed for your entire home. Your package also includes one HD-ready non-DVR receiver. Additional receivers are $7 per month each. You can have a total of 8 receivers, including the Total Home DVR.

v4:choice.v4:name: AT&T U-verse Hardware Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: 1 HD-ready DVR receiver included

v4:choice.v4:name: AT&T U-verse Hardware Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: 1 HD-ready DVR receiver + 1 HD-ready non-DVR receiver included + 4 HD-ready non-DVR receivers

v4:choice.v4:name: AT&T U-verse Hardware Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: 1 HD-ready DVR receiver + 1 HD-ready non-DVR receiver included + 6 HD-ready non-DVR receivers

v4:choice.v4:name: AT&T U-verse Hardware Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: 1 HD-ready DVR receiver + 1 HD-ready non-DVR receiver included + 2 HD-ready non-DVR receivers

v4:choice.v4:name: AT&T U-verse Hardware Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: 1 HD-ready DVR receiver + 1 HD-ready non-DVR receiver included + 1 HD-ready non-DVR receiver

v4:choice.v4:name: AT&T U-verse Hardware Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: 1 HD-ready DVR receiver + 1 HD-ready non-DVR receiver included + 5 HD-ready non-DVR receivers

v4:choice.v4:name: AT&T U-verse Hardware Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: 1 HD-ready DVR receiver + 1 HD-ready non-DVR receiver included

v4:choice.v4:name: AT&T U-verse Hardware Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: 1 HD-ready DVR receiver + 1 HD-ready non-DVR receiver included + 3 HD-ready non-DVR receivers

v4:customization.v4:name: Video Hardware Options
v4:customization.v4:shortDescription: Would you like any of your receivers to be wireless? Order U300+ and get a free wireless receiver. A $49 onetime charge applies to a second wireless receiver, plus the standard $7 per month receiver fee.
v4:customization.v4:longDescription: An AT&T Wireless Receiver gives you the freedom to set up your TV virtually anywhere you want it - in any room, on any wall and without the need to connect to an existing TV outlet.

v4:choice.v4:name: AT&T U-verse Hardware Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: All of your receivers will be wired.

v4:choice.v4:name: AT&T U-verse Hardware Options
v4:choice.v4:shortDescription: 2 Wireless Receivers - Order U300+ and get a free wireless receiver
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: Design your room and arrange your furniture to suit your style, since the TV is no longer tied to the TV outlet. Have a TV in rooms not typically wired for TV. Easily move your TV for special events or special house guests. Use one receiver to serve multiple, less-frequented rooms in your home.

v4:choice.v4:name: AT&T U-verse Hardware Options
v4:choice.v4:shortDescription: 1 Wireless Receiver - Order U300+ and get a free wireless receiver
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: Design your room and arrange your furniture to suit your style, since the TV is no longer tied to the TV outlet. Have a TV in rooms not typically wired for TV. Easily move your TV for special events or special house guests. Use one receiver to serve multiple, less-frequented rooms in your home.

v4:customization.v4:name: U-verse TV Activation Fee
v4:customization.v4:longDescription: A one-time TV service activation fee of $49 applies.

v4:choice.v4:name: U-verse Activation Fee
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: $49 Required One Time Activation Fee

v4:customization.v4:name: Video Programming Options
v4:customization.v4:shortDescription: Video Programming Options-Select additional programming packages at a great low monthly fee.
v4:customization.v4:longDescription: You may choose from the following packages: HBO/Cinemax�, HBO�, Cinemax�, The Sports Package, Paquete Espanol Package, High Definition (HD) Service, HD Service with Premium Tier, and Fox Soccer Plus HD.

v4:choice.v4:name: Video Programming Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: Spanish-language package featuring novellas, movies, news, sports, children's programming, and more.

v4:choice.v4:name: Video Programming Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: HDTV service offers channels with extraordinary video resolution and superior digital sound. If you have an HD-ready TV, you can enhance your entertainment experience with AT&T U-verse HD service.

v4:choice.v4:name: Video Programming Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: Up to 28 HBO� channels. Regular price $16. HBO� offers the most innovative, groundbreaking entertainment around with powerful, award-winning original movies, specials, and series; exclusive boxing coverage, sports series and specials; and the biggest hit movies coming out of Hollywood. On Sunday nights, HBO� showcases its award-winning original series. Saturday nights are the destination for top Hollywood hits and HBO� Films' acclaimed movies.

v4:choice.v4:name: Video Programming Options
v4:choice.v4:shortDescription: Fox Soccer Plus HD - Requires subscription to HD Service ($10/month)
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: Fox Soccer Plus HD is the premium sports network that elevates the soccer experience. It delivers live, exclusive soccer matches from the best leagues in the world including: England's Barclays Premier League, the UEFA Champions League, and Italy's Serie A.

v4:choice.v4:name: Video Programming Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: Up to 24 Cinemax channels. Exclusive Hollywood premieres and the biggest variety of hit First-Run Theatrical Premieres, Top Box Office Releases and Movie Favorites make Cinemax the ultimate movie service. Turn to Cinemax every night at 10 p.m. for the MaxTime Hit movie, and every Saturday night at 10 p.m. for an exclusive movie premiere. Plus, catch the monthly Reel Life series for a riveting and eclectic showcase of independent documentaries.

v4:choice.v4:name: Video Programming Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: Includes Fox College Sports plus The Sportsman Channel, GolTV (English), Horseracing TV, and more.

v4:choice.v4:name: Video Programming Options
v4:choice.v4:shortDescription: HBO/Cinemax Package - Free for three months
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: 28 HBO Channels; 24 Cinemax Channels. Regular price $26.

v4:choice.v4:name: Video Programming Options
v4:choice.v4:shortDescription: High Definition (HD) Service with Premium Tier
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: HDTV service offers channels with extraordinary video resolution and superior digital sound. If you have an HD-ready TV, you can enhance your entertainment experience with AT&T U-verse HD service. Also includes HD Premium Tier, which is an add-on package of prime, high-definition channels, including: Sony Movie Channel, NFL RedZone (seasonal), Palladia HD, Smithsonian Channel HD, and more.

v4:customization.v4:name: U-verse Monthly Internet Equipment Fee
v4:customization.v4:shortDescription: $6 Required Monthly U-verse High Speed Internet Equipment Fee
v4:customization.v4:longDescription: A $6 monthly High Speed Internet equipment fee applies.

v4:choice.v4:name: U-verse Internet Equipment Fee
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: $6 Required U-verse Monthly Equipment Fee

v4:customization.v4:name: Choose your Promotion
v4:customization.v4:shortDescription: Choose between $36 off your bill for twelve months or a $200 Reward Card from AT&T
v4:customization.v4:longDescription: You can choose to get $36 off your bill for the first twelve months, or you can get a $200 Reward Card from AT&T.

v4:choice.v4:name: Promotion Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: Discounted price will be reflected on your first bill.

v4:choice.v4:name: Promotion Options
v4:choice.v4:longDescription: Get a $200 Reward Card from AT&T

v4:marketingHighlights.v4:marketingHighlight: Up to 360 Channels, locals included along with the following Premium channels - The Movie Package (Starz�, Encore�, Showtime �, FLIX�, TMC�)
Record up to 4 shows at once on a single DVR
Multiview allows you to follow up to four channels at once and know the right moments to switch
Convenient Billing: All U-verse services provided on the same bill. A one-time TV service activation fee of $49 and $6 monthly High Speed Internet equipment fee applies.

AT&T U-verse Minimum System Requirements: Windows - Processor: 1 GHz 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64); Operating System: Windows XP, Vista (32- & 64-bit), Windows 7 (32- & 64-bit); Disk Space: 2 GB of hard drive capacity (if you want all accompanying software); Memory: 1 GB of system memory recommended. Macintosh - Processor: PowerPC (G3, G4, G5, iMac); Operating System: Mac OS 9 to OS X 10.6 (a.k.a. Snow Leopard) excluding 10.0 (a.k.a. Puma); Disk Space: 100 MB of free disk space; Memory: 512 MB of system memory recommended.
Please note: It may be necessary for an AT&T representative to contact you before your order can be completed.

v4:descriptiveInfo.v4:value: The AT&T U-verse Double Pack offers a bundled package for your convenience. This bundle provides Digital TV service and High-Speed Internet. U300 TV includes up to 360 channels - including The Movie Package (This package has more than 53 channels of SHOWTIME , The Movie Channel (TMC)TM, FLIX , Starz , and Encore).U-verse TV offers a crystal-clear picture, choice programming, access to a robust HD channel lineup, large On Demand selection, Total Home DVR, exciting interactive features like our new award-winning Multiview, and so much more. U-verse High Speed Internet offers powerful security features, a wide range of downstream speeds, wireless home networking capability, and virtually unlimited email storage. Includes on-the-go access to the entire national AT&T Wi-Fi Hotspot network, at no extra charge.

AT&T U-verse: Pricing excludes taxes, fees and other charges, including city video cost-recovery fees, where applicable. A one-time TV Service Activation Fee of $49 applies. Residential customers only. Prices, programming and offers subject to change without notice. Credit restrictions may apply. Channel counts include optional channels. Total Home DVR functionality is available on up to 8 TVs, and requires a receiver for each additional TV at $7/mo. each. AT&T U-verse High Speed Internet: Residential customers only. Prices and offers subject to change without notice. Internet speed claim(s) represent maximum downstream speed capabilities. Speeds may vary and are not guaranteed. Many factors can affect actual speeds including the use of other U-verse services. Credit and other restrictions apply. A $6 monthly High Speed Internet equipment fee applies. U-verse price includes 250 GB of data/mo. For more information, go to www.att.com/internet-usage. Access includes AT&T Wi-Fi Basic. Wi-Fi enabled device required. Other restrictions apply. See www.attwifi.com for details and locations. Use of Wi-Fi at home will count toward your AT&T High Speed Internet usage allowance. Bundle Offer: Offer ends 11/3/12. After 12 months, standard rates apply unless cancelled by customer. Must maintain qualifying services for continued receipt of credit. An early termination fee of up to $180 may apply if U-verse services are terminated before end of term. Bundle Offer: Offer ends 11/3/12. New residential U-verse customers with new or existing Nation 450 wireless. After 12 months, standard rates apply unless cancelled by customer. Must maintain qualifying services for continued receipt of credit. An early termination fee of up to $180 may apply if U-verse services are terminated before end of term. $200 AT&T U-verse Reward Card available to new U-verse residential customers for minimum purchase of U-family TV and U-verse Internet Pro. May not be combined with promotional bundle offers. Offer ends 11/3/12. $300 AT&T Reward Card available to new U-verse residential customers for minimum of U-family TV, U-verse Internet Pro, and U-verse Voice 250 or Nation 450 wireless plan . May not be combined with promotional bundle offers. Offer ends 12/31/12. Card redemption required. Card sent 4-6 weeks after redemption to customers who retain qualifying service(s). Not redeemable for cash, for use at automated gasoline pumps or for cash withdrawal at ATMs. Card expires 90 days after issuance. For cardholder agreement/terms and conditions go to http://rewardcenter.att.com/myrewardcard/agreement.pdf. Cards are issued by U.S. Bank National Association, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Installation Included with Most Packages: Offer ends 11/3/12. Credit qualified customers only. Installation not included with U-basic package. 3 Months Free HBO�/Cinemax� Offer: Offer ends 11/3/12. U-verse TV customers adding HBO�/Cinemax�. After 3 months, standard rates apply unless cancelled by customer. HBO�, Cinemax� and related channels and service marks are the property of Home Box Office Inc. Receiver offer available for new U-verse TV customers ordering and maintaining U300 or higher TV package. Offer is for one HD-ready DVR and one HD-ready Wireless Receiver at no additional cost. U-verse receiver offers cannot be combined. Wireless Receiver requires power outlet and connection of receiver to TV; go to att.com/freedom for details. Technical restrictions apply; may not be available to all customers. � 2012 AT&T Intellectual Property. AT&T, AT&T U-verse, the AT&T logo and all other AT&T marks contained herein are trademarks of AT&T Intellectual Property and/or AT&T affiliated companies. All rights reserved. Subsidiaries and affiliates of AT&T Inc. provide products and services under the AT&T brand.

v4:promotion.v4:shortDescription: Choose between $36 off for twelve months or a $200 Reward Card from AT&T.
v4:promotion.v4:description: Order U-family or higher TV and choose either $36 off your bill for 12 months or a $200 AT&T Reward Card. For new residential U-verse customers.
v4:promotion.v4:conditions: $200 AT&T U-verse Reward Card available to new U-verse residential customers for minimum purchase of U-family TV and U-verse Internet Pro. May not be combined with promotional bundle offers. Offer ends 11/3/12. Card redemption required. Card sent 4-6 weeks after redemption to customers who retain qualifying service(s). Not redeemable for cash, for use at automated gasoline pumps or for cash withdrawal at ATMs. Card expires 90 days after issuance. For cardholder agreement/terms and conditions go to http://rewardcenter.att.com/myrewardcard/agreement.pdf. Cards are issued by U.S. Bank National Association, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. $36 Off for 12 Months: Offer ends 11/3/12. New residential U-verse customers ordering U-family TV and U-verse Internet Pro. After 6 months, standard rates apply unless cancelled by customer.

v4:promotion.v4:shortDescription: Order U300 TV or above and a Second TV Receiver is included.
v4:promotion.v4:description: Order U-verse U300, U300 Latino, U450 or U450 Latino and a second TV receiver is included, a $7 per month value.
